pkgmetadata.longdescription: Solving and Optimizing Large-Scale Nonlinear Systems // Barzilai- Borwein spectral methods for solving nonlinear system of equations, and for optimizing nonlinear objective functions subject to simple constraints. A tutorial style introduction to this package is available in a vignette on the CRAN download page or, when the package is loaded in an R session, with vignette("BB").
